DataElement.preferredName: Metastatic Diagnosis Adjuvant I-131 Therapy Administered CPTAC Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to indicate whether radioiodine therapy was administered with the intent of suppressing secondary tumor formation in the presence of metastatic disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Metastatic Diagnosis Adjuvant I-131 Therapy Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any diagnosis indicating the presence of metastatic disease._A question whether radioiodine therapy was administered with the intent of suppressing secondary tumor formation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
